name: painfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that causes pain: Without surgery, this animal will die slowly and painfully.
used to emphasize a quality, action, or situation that is unpleasant or not wanted: I am painfully aware that I have made mistakes. It was a painfully slow journey.
